You are awesome

Users are able to claim your Jetton tokens. After paying the transaction fee tokens will be sent to the binded wallet.

Tokens Claiming

The user pays a commission of 0.07 TON and the tokens are sent to the linked wallet. You do not pay transaction fees, so you are not limited in the number of users you can attract to participate in the airdrop. Our app will also soon support Mintless Jettons - a new token standard.
